Text:
I assume where you wrote "Source: BluRay Region B "  you meant Region 2?

For future reference there is no Region B or any letter.  It is Region: 0-8 + Region: All.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DVD_region_code#Region_codes_and_countries

Mattmjn :

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blu-ray_Disc#Region_codes

Blu rays aren't DVDs...

Blu ray regions : A B or C
